process.title: Our Process: From Tailored Risk to Operational Implementation.
process.subtitle: We work with your teams to create a reliable parametric product that is simple to operate and tailored to your agricultural clients.

steps.label: Trigger Design
steps.description: Defining the climatic index (temperature, precipitation, vegetation health index) and validating 'basis risk' through backtesting.

steps.label: Data Certification
steps.description: Using certified data sources (GOES, Sentinel, CHIRPS) to ensure the traceability and integrity of the index.

steps.label: Implementation & Operations
steps.description: Full integration into the ClimaVista platform for simple policy management and automated payout calculation.

technology.title: Index Accuracy: The Science Behind the Trust.
sources: Vegetation Index (NDVI) via **Sentinel-2** for crop health monitoring.
Storm and Frost Data via **GOES** for rapid event detection.
Precipitation Models via **CHIRPS** for historical and real-time coverage.
Integration of **Radar** data for enhanced precision on hail and intense precipitation.
